pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bias Reduction with Missing Binary Response // Provides two main functions, il() and fil(). The il() function implements the EM algorithm developed by Ibrahim and Lipsitz (1996) DOI:10.2307/2533068 to estimate the parameters of a logistic regression model with the missing response when the missing data mechanism is nonignorable. The fil() function implements the algorithm proposed by Maity et. al. (2017+) https://github.com/arnabkrmaity/brlrmr to reduce the bias produced by the method of Ibrahim and Lipsitz (1996) DOI:10.2307/2533068.
